comments.body: shouldCallHook is currently called on all hooks before dispatching to any of them. we wanted to call this inside the loop in mutatingDispatcher#Dispatch so the labels we evaluate on are the ones on the objects sent to the webhook
that may mean Dispatch needs to be given an unfiltered list of webhooks and a way to invoke the `shouldCallHook` function
Do we care about ordering of equivalents? E.g. prefer v1 over v1beta1 if both would match the rule?

the returned list is in the order registered

the order registered for CRDs is the order listed in the CRD spec.versions list

the order registered for in-tree resources is the order installed, which is the order we list in discovery (for example, deployments prefers this order: extensions/v1beta1, apps/v1, apps/v1beta1, apps/v1alpha1)

that order seems reasonable to me
